org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Class LruOptimiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SkelOptor
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.ReplicatingOptimiser
        • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.LruOptimiser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Optimisable

    public class LruOptimiser
extends ReplicatingOptimiser
    This optimiser replicates files at all times unless it is not possible due to all files on the local SE being pinned or masters. To create space for the replicated files it deletes the oldest files on the local SE, that is, the files which were created least recently.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4
